Lovakite ore is a type of ore that can be obtained through Mining, and is only found in the lovakite mine in Lovakengj. Mining this ore requires at least 30% Lovakengj favour.

Lovakite ore can be mined with a Mining level of 65 or higher, granting 10 Mining experience. Lovakite ore has a respawn time of 30–45 seconds.

It can be smelted into a lovakite bar with two heaps of coal, requiring level 45 in Smithing and granting 20 experience. Lovakite can only be smelted at the furnace south of the Blast Mine or via Superheat Item. Lovakite bars can then be smithed into Shayzien supply armour.

It takes 11 bars to make one full set of armour, equivalent to 11 lovakite ores and 22 heaps of coal. When delivered to an armourer, a bonus of 675 Mining experience is given. With this Mining bonus taken into account, one ore accounts for a total of 72 experience.

Varrock armour 2 and higher levels of Varrock armour has a chance to double the number of ores received from mining and allow the player to smelt two bars of lovakite simultaneously.

[[File:Lovakite ore detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Lovakite ore''' is a type of ore that can be obtained through [[Mining]], and is only found in the [[lovakite mine]] in [[Lovakengj]]. Mining this ore requires at least 30% Lovakengj [[favour]].

Lovakite ore can be mined with a Mining level of 65 or higher, granting 10 Mining [[experience]]. Lovakite ore has a respawn time of 30–45 seconds.

It can be smelted into a [[lovakite bar]] with two heaps of [[coal]], requiring level 45 in [[Smithing]] and granting 20 experience. Lovakite can '''only''' be smelted at the furnace south of the [[Blast Mine]] or via [[Superheat Item]]. Lovakite bars can then be smithed into [[Shayzien supply armour]].

It takes 11 bars to make one full set of armour, equivalent to 11 lovakite ores and 22 heaps of coal. When delivered to an [[armourer]], a bonus of 675 Mining experience is given. With this Mining bonus taken into account, one ore accounts for a total of 72 experience.

[[Varrock armour 2]] and higher levels of Varrock armour has a chance to double the number of ores received from mining and allow the player to smelt two bars of lovakite simultaneously.
